## Component() function

Component decorator, used to mark a class as a component and register it to IOC container.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function Component(identifier?: string, type?: string): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

identifier


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional identifier for the component. If not provided, will use the class name.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

type


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

ClassDecorator

ClassDecorator function that registers the target class as a component.

## Example


```ts
@Component()
class UserDto {}

@Component('customName')
class OrderClass {}
```
